items.headline: My stepdaughter is buying a house. Can her soon-to-be ex-husband claim a share?

items.headline: My father died leaving an old will predating his fourth wife. Who inherits his estate?

items.headline: I’m 77. Despite my $1.4 million wealth, my expenses exceed my income. Do I sell stocks to pay off my mortgage?
